scripts.start:ts: npm run build && ts-node-dev --project tsconfig.json index.ts
scripts.test:curl-bot: curl -fsSL -A 'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; Googlebot/2.1; +http://www.google.com/bot.html)' -H 'Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5' -H 'Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate' -H 'Connection: keep-alive' -H 'Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1' 'http://0.0.0.0:8080/' > output.html && xdg-open output.html
